member.name: T:BattleField7Namespace.InitialGameClass.BattleGame
member.summary: Това е по - лесен за четене вариант на основния клас. Единствените промени до момента са в именуването и подреждането, има изведени и няколко помощни метода от повтарящия се код. Оставил съм закоментирани старите съдържания на най - безобразно заплетените методи за сравнение и в случай, че абстракцията ми не е сработила добре. Не съм променял нищо по логиката, макар на места да може да има нужда (NumberInRange() методът със сигурност). Ако ще пренаписваме всичко отначало, поне ще може да сравняваме функционалността с този вариант. Оставих името Bombi, за да не заемам някое по - подходящо, което да дадем на нов проект. //vnci

member.name: M:BattleField7Namespace.InitialGameClass.BattleGame.NumberInRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Random number generator
member.returns: An Integer in the range between and
member.remarks: Needs rebuild to generate new numbers, otherwise the field prodiced is always the same for the given size.

member.summary: Represents an explosion that spreads straight in all four directions, clearing bombs and empty cells in its path

member.name: M:BattleField7Namespace.InitialGameClass.BattleGame.DiagonalSplash(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Represents an explosion that spreads diagonally in all four directions, clearing bombs and empty cells in its path

member.summary: Determines if there is a bomb at given coordinates
member.returns: True if the cell has not been cleared already and is not marked as empty in the beginning

member.summary: /// Logic for getting the coordinates of a blast after detonation of a bomb

member.summary: Logic for getting the coordinates of a blast after detonation of a bomb

member.name: M:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.Interfaces.IExplosionStrategy.GetCoordsToDetonateByTheBlast(System.Tuple{System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the coords to detonate by the blast.
member.returns: The coordinates of the fields to detonate by chain reaction.

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.GameClasses.SimpleExplosionStrategy.explosionRangePositionsGroupedByPower
member.summary: The explosion range positions grouped by power. The outer List has 5 elements (lists), representing the 5 possible explosive powers. The middle List has all the relative cell positions for a specific explosive power (only the unique positions) A relative position is represented by an int array of 2 elements - row and column, witch are to be added to the detonation position in order to get the coordinates of the specified position.

member.name: M:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.GameClasses.SimpleExplosionStrategy.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the coords to detonate by the blast.

member.name: M:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.GameClasses.SimpleExplosionStrategy.GetCoordsToDetonateByTheBlast(System.Tuple{System.Int32,System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the coords to detonate by the blast.
member.returns: The coordinates of the fields to detonate by chain reaction.
member.exception: A negative coordinate is out of range or Negative explosive power is out of range

member.name: T:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.Enumerations.LoggingRestrictionLevels
member.summary: Enumeration of the possible restriction levels for the Logger.

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.Enumerations.LoggingRestrictionLevels.All
member.summary: The lowest restriction level - everything is to be logged.

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.Enumerations.LoggingRestrictionLevels.StartUps
member.summary: Event logs are to be ignored. Only StartUp, Warning and Erorr logs will be logged.

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.Enumerations.LoggingRestrictionLevels.Warnings
member.summary: Event and StartUp logs are to be ignored. Only Warning and Error logs will be logged.

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.Enumerations.LoggingRestrictionLevels.Errors
member.summary: Event, StartUp and Warning logs are to be ignored. Only Error logs will be logged.

member.name: M:BattleField7Namespace.MainClass.Main
member.summary: Simply calls the engine and runs it.

member.summary: A Windows Forms game interface

member.summary: The size input window

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.UIClasses.WinFormsUI.gameFieldIsInitialized
member.summary: Needed for a check before drawing the game field, becouse the thread of the form might still not be ready with setting up the game grid's size, when the Drawer.DrawGame() method is called.

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.UIClasses.WinFormsUI.gameFieldCellIsSelected
member.summary: Needed for the active waiting for cell position input. It is false when input is not needed, or when a cell isn't yet clicked. It becomes true only for a moment, when a cell is selected during an active waiting.

member.name: F:BattleField7Namespace.NewGameDesign.UIClasses.WinFormsUI.awaitingGameFieldCellSelection
member.summary: Needed for for a check on game grid cell selection. If there is an active waiting for input, the method will set gameFieldCellIsSelected to true. Otherwise it will ignore the input.
